thread.title: UAE- Dubai hosts 11th Natalie Tours Congress today
thread.title_full: UAE- Dubai hosts 11th Natalie Tours Congress today | MENAFN.COM

author: Emirates News Agency (WAM)
title: UAE- Dubai hosts 11th Natalie Tours Congress today
text:
(MENAFN - Emirates News Agency (WAM)) DUBAI 28th September 2015 (WAM) -- The 11th Natalie Tours Congress began in Dubai today with the participation of executives from 220 tourism companies from 10 Russian cities at Atlantis The Palm. 
Organised jointly by Alpha Destination Management and Natalie Tours the leading tour operator in the Russian markets the congress will see the participation of senior officials from the Dubai Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing DTCM Emirates Airline flydubai and the General Directorate of Residency and Foreigners Affairs in Dubai GDRFA-Dubai. 
The congress is being held with the cooperation of DTCM which has been extensively promoting Dubai in Russia and CIS markets over the years with Alpha Destination Management being a key player in the aggressive marketing drive. 
The congress participants will learn about the attractions of Dubai and how Russian tourists could enjoy their holidays in the emirate during the upcoming winter season and beyond. The congress will deliberate about the challenges and difficulties facing this market due to economic developments. As well as the senior executives of Alpha Destination Management and Natalie Tours the congress will be addressed by a senior representative of Atlantis The Palm which is a popular hotel for the Russian tourists. Adnan Aridi Managing Director of Alpha Destination Management said the Congress occupies a prominent place in the calendar of events of Dubai as it plays an important role in the efforts towards increasing the number of Russian tourists to Dubai each year. 


WAM/Hanaa/Moran
